page.title: 01 GENERAL SUMMARY
page.content: Grid reference 02920069 covers an area that is mainly agricultural land and sea. The main area of population within the grid is Shaldon, a village which is to be found at the mouth of the river Teign. Our project was to be centred on the Shaldon area. Places of interest that we selected included the Wildlife Trust, the Ness headland, Ness House, Coast View Country Club and Ringmore. We also studied the fishing industry and interviewed a local fisherman. The area studied has 3 major sources of income, tourism, fishing and farming. In our survey we hope that we have covered all of these areas.
